original_text:
Behold, these shall come from afar,
    and behold, these from the north and from the west,
    and these from the land of Syene.”
korean_text: 어떤 사람은 먼 곳에서, 어떤 사람은 북쪽과 서쪽에서, 어떤 사람은 시님 땅에서 오리라

sentences.original_text: Behold, these shall come from afar
behold, these from the north and from the west
and these from the land of Syene.
